import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets all books
getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books/");},searchBooks:function searchBooks(keywords){return axios.get("/api/searchBooks/"+keywords);},// Deletes the book with the given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);},// Saves a book to the database
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);}};
